Title: Creates esophageal cancer educational pamphlets and requires esophageal cancer testing and treatments be covered by certain insurance plans
Summary: Creates esophageal cancer educational pamphlets; requires esophageal cancer testing and treatments be covered by certain insurance plans.
LawCode: Add §2404-e, Pub Health L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to creating esophageal cancer educational pamphlets and requiring esophageal cancer testing and treatments be covered by certain insurance plans
